Interface ActivationFunction

public interface ActivationFunction
Interface definition for neural network activation functions. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ActivationFunction
    RELU
    ReLU activation function.
    static final ActivationFunction
    SIGMOID
    Sigmoid activation function.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Real

  • Field Details

    • SIGMOID

      static final ActivationFunction SIGMOID
      Sigmoid activation function.

    • RELU

      static final ActivationFunction RELU
      ReLU activation function.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      Real apply(Real input)
      Applies the activation function to a value.
      Parameters:
      input - the input value
      Returns:
      the activated value

    • derivative

      Real derivative(Real input)
      Calculates the derivative of the activation function.
      Parameters:
      input - the input value (often the output of the activation function itself depending on implementation)
      Returns:
      the derivative
